name: Companies that performed manufacturing tasks for unaffiliated companies or companies outside the United States, by company type and company size: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.description: Did Not Perform Manufacturing Tasks For Others

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2020 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2019.
